manager_intro.base: Good afternoon. Please, have a seat. Let's begin your annual performance review.

variants.text: Ah, there you are. Let's begin again.
You're back. Let's continue where we left off.
Please sit down. We have... concerns to discuss.
Welcome. Let's begin your first performance review.

manager_rating_intro.base: Your performance this quarter has been... adequate. Let's review the numbers.

variants.text: Your compliance metrics are excellent. The company appreciates your cooperation.
Your metrics indicate some... reluctance. This is noted.
Your development is ongoing. Improvement is mandatory.
You have demonstrated hesitation. You require restructuring.

manager_question_response.base: That's an interesting perspective. However, the metrics speak for themselves.

variants.text: You've raised this concern before. The answer remains the same.
Questions are not part of this process. Please continue.

manager_signature_request.base: Please sign at the bottom to acknowledge this review.

variants.text: Sign here. As you've done before.
The signature is required. This is not optional.
Sign. Now.
The document has been signed.

manager_refusal_response.base: I understand you need time to consider. Take a moment.

variants.text: We've been through this. Your signature is expected.
Non-compliance will result in retraining.
Refusal is not an available option. Proceed.

manager_exit_blocked.base: The door is locked during the review. Standard procedure.

variants.text: You know the door doesn't open until we're finished.
There is no exit. There is only the review.
Exit is a performance metric. You have not achieved it.

manager_loop_end.base: Thank you for your time. We'll reconvene shortly.

variants.text: Excellent cooperation. Your compliance is appreciated.
This review is incomplete. We will continue.
You are not here to succeed. You are here to improve. You will remain until improvement is achieved.

manager_idle.base: Is there something you'd like to discuss?

variants.text: We should proceed. Time is a resource.
Hesitation is noted in your file.
Your delay does not delay the process.

ending_compliant.base: Congratulations. You have achieved full compliance. Welcome to the team. Permanently.

ending_promoted.base: Your dedication has been recognized. You will now conduct reviews. Forever.

ending_terminated.base: Your performance has been deemed unsatisfactory. Retraining will commence.

ending_self_realization.base: You see it now, don't you? The loop. The system. But seeing changes nothing.

ending_system_failure.base: ERROR: Review cycle exceeded parameters. Resetting employee record. Welcome. Let's begin your first performance review.
